features: 【2024 Electronics Fast Push Bubble Game】Take the traditional bubble pop game to a higher level by combining fast electronic game. This pop fidget toy is a hot handheld game for anyone. Follow the music and quickly press the light-up button with your fingers to experience endless gaming pleasure. It's also an addictive and versatile pop sensory toy game, Kids will engage in positive thinking and hand-eye coordination under game challenges filled with lights and sounds.

【Upgraded Puzzle Handheld Game】This Educational Toy is upgraded to 999 levels for higher difficulty. Challenge Mode, Memory Mode, Score Mode, and Multiplayer Mode. Challenge mode and memory mode help to exercise children's reaction speed and memory so that get a sense of accomplishment from advanced breakthroughs. Multiplayer mode helps cultivate children's sense of competition and teamwork. Push the light-up bubble fast and pass each level correctly for more breaks!

【Start Quick Push Game】Experience the top gaming pleasure anywhere with the electric pop it game. Immerse yourself in beautiful plastic and silicone bubble game machine made of high-quality materials. The ergonomically designed handle fits perfectly in your hands, light and portable body ensuring hours of movement without discomfort. Start the game immediately with the portable one-button switch. Adjust the sound level to your preference and indulge in this game world even during serene nights!

【Interactive Fidget Toys】It's pop pro light up game, the wide all-ages experience! Help kids stay away from phones and tablets, effectively reduce screen time. Children can play with friends or parents at the party and any outdoor/indoor activities. Fidget toy games can also help you focus and beat boredom. This decompression toy is a good helper to relieve work, study, family, and office pressure and generate happiness. Create unforgettable moments and foster connections with other ones today!

【The Best Gift from Wowsome】Wowsome Handheld Games, Your First Choice for Gifting! It is a wonderful gift for birthdays, Easter hunt parties, back to school rewards, thanksgiving, Halloween, Christmas, and gift bag filler. Especially suitable as creative Xmas stocking stuffers for kids ages 6-12+ boys and girls. YOU WILL GET: Wowsome Pop Fast Push Handheld Puzzle Game Console, Screwdrivers, Game Manual, and our friendly customer service. [3*AAA batteries not included]
body.description: Are you still worried about your child's addiction to TV, mobile phone, and computer? Choose this 2024 latest upgrade mini puzzle game hot toy, let your children experience endless happy non-stop breakthroughs! Specification: Material: ABS, silicone Color: Blue, Pink, Green Power supply: 3*AAA batteries (not included) 4 Mode: Challenge mode, Memory mode, Scoring mode, Multiplayer mode *For specific rules, please refer to the additional manual* Warm Tips 1. If there is no response or shutdown during the game, the batteries may be low, please replace the batteries. 2. Press the mode selection button to select the mode of your preference. After the mode is selected, you cannot enter the game unless you press the back button. 3. Open the battery cover and use 3*AAA batteries. (not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Addictive for adults too
reviews.reviewText: I bought a set as stocking stuffers for my 5 y.o. niece and my 9 y.o. nephew. I asked for my 19 y.o. daughter to put batteries in them before wrapping them up individually to place them as stocking stuffers. 1 box comes with a set of 2 so what I buy for 1 child, I have to buy for the other or they get territorial.My daughter & her 19 y.o. boyfriend each put the batteries in the game and started playing around with it when they were supposed to be wrapping it. Well, I saw how excited they were and they could not stop playing w it. My daughter was envious so guess what, I had to get them a set for stocking stuffers as well.Fast fwd and my niece & nephew brought their games to our family Xmas party and the next thing you know my 28 y.o. cousin & her 32 y.o. fiancé are entranced in the game. They are passing it around and everyone wants a piece of it, including me. Geeze.Now I had to buy 2 other sets; 1 for my cousin & her fiancé & one for me and my mom who I think would be good for her as she suffered a stroke 2 yrs ago and can only use 1 hand and is slightly delayed in her cognitive skills. I think it would engage her and would be a good exercise tool for her. Meanwhile, my sister is annoyed bc it’s loud AF but you can mute it & still play & follow along bc the keypad lights up.My whole point is that it’s a fun engaging & portable game at any age & at the right price point of $10/game! Yes I probably would end up buying again . So far, the game looks durable enough.BTW, 3 in our family have ADHD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Now here’s a fun little toy. That is just perfect for adults also. Especially those with fidgety fingers. I find it excellent for the seniors to use also. Keep the mind and the fingers working. I recommend this fun and enjoyable toy for not only young children Young teens, but more importantly, for us seniors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The kids love it even I do as an adult. It’s relaxing. I don’t like that it pops so loud.
